mapper.select:
select FVRT_LOC_NO as fvrtLocNo , MBR_ID as mbrId , FVRT_LOC_NAME as fvrtLocName , FVRT_LOC_LAT as fvrtLocLat , FVRT_LOC_LNG as fvrtLocLng , FVRT_LOC_REG_DATE as fvrtLocRegDate , FVRT_LOC_RANK as fvrtLocRank , FVRT_LOC_STATUS as fvrtLocStatus from FVRT_LOC where 1 = 1 and MBR_ID = #{mbrId} and FVRT_LOC_STATUS = #{fvrtLocStatus}
order by FVRT_LOC_RANK
mapper.insert: insert into FVRT_LOC( MBR_ID , FVRT_LOC_NAME , FVRT_LOC_LAT , FVRT_LOC_LNG , FVRT_LOC_REG_DATE , FVRT_LOC_RANK , FVRT_LOC_STATUS ) values ( #{mbrId}, #{fvrtLocName}, #{fvrtLocLat}, #{fvrtLocLng}, now(), #{fvrtLocRank}, #{fvrtLocStatus} )
